About Us

Salahkaar Realtors is a leading real estate advisory firm based in Noida, India. Established in 2018 by industry veterans Tanmmay Talwar and Rajneessh Sharma, our team brings over four decades of combined experience in the banking and real estate sectors. We are committed to delivering outstanding results by offering personalized, professional, and confidential advice.
